data.title: Fruits or Veggies
data.statement:
<<Display the number of fruits and the number of vegetables given in the string [[s]]>>

The classification fruits and veggies are given below.

testCases.title: A mix of both
testCases.testIn: Pumpkin Mango Kiwi Eggplant Carrot Celery

testCases.title: Do not blend them together
testCases.testIn: Banana Celery Lemon Cucumber Melon Peas

testCases.title: A healthy meal
testCases.testIn: Apple Carrot Banana Orange Celery Pumpkin Lemon Grape Eggplant Mango Lettuce Kiwi Melon Onion Peas

testCases.title: Everything
testCases.testIn: Apple Carrot Banana Orange Celery Pumpkin Lemon Grape Eggplant Mango Lettuce Kiwi Melon Onion Peas Cucumber Cherry

data.constraints:
List of Fruits that can be given : <<Apple, Banana, Cherry, Orange, Lemon, Grape, Mango, Kiwi, Melon>>
List of Vegetables that can be given : <<Carrot, Pumpkin, Celery, Cucumber, Eggplant, Lettuce, Onion, Peas>>
data.stubGenerator:
read s:string(256)
write Fruits : 0
Veggies : 0

STATEMENT
Fruits : Apple, Banana, Cherry, Orange, Lemon, Grape, Mango, Kiwi, Melon
Veggies : Carrot, Pumpkin, Celery, Cucumber, Eggplant, Lettuce, Onion, Peas
data.inputDescription: <<line 1 :>> the list [[s]] with some fruits and veggies, separated by a <<single space>>
data.outputDescription:
<<line 1 :>> the number of fruits in the format {{Fruits : }}[[number of fruits]]
<<line 2 :>> the number of vegetables in the format {{Veggies : }}[[number of vegetables]]

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Display the number of fruits and the number of vegetables given in the string s

The classification fruits and veggies are given below.
Input
line 1 : the list s with some fruits and veggies, separated by a single space
Output
line 1 : the number of fruits in the format Fruits : number of fruits
line 2 : the number of vegetables in the format Veggies : number of vegetables
Constraints
List of Fruits that can be given : Apple, Banana, Cherry, Orange, Lemon, Grape, Mango, Kiwi, Melon
List of Vegetables that can be given : Carrot, Pumpkin, Celery, Cucumber, Eggplant, Lettuce, Onion, Peas
Example
Input
Apple
Output
Fruits : 1
Veggies : 0
